Template.Name: First integer value after channel ID
Template.Description: Matches the first integer value following the initial "[channel]" part.

Template.Name: Last integer value
Template.Description: Matches a decimal integer in the end of the string.

Template.Name: Labeled integer value
Template.Description: Matches the first decimal integer following the label "MyVal:" and any spaces in between.

Template.Name: First Double value after channel ID
Template.Description: Matches the first Double value following the initial "[channel]" part. (e.g. 3,14 or -2,343E-12). Comma is used as decimal separator.
